description: TEHRAN — The Islamic Revolution Guard Corps (IRGC) announced the successful targeting of 14 strategic military and industrial sites across occupied Palestinian territories overnight, marking the 18th wave of Operation True Promise III in Saturday as "among the most innovative and effective missile and drone operations in recent history."
title: 14 hits in latest operations reveal Israeli vulnerability: IRGC

description: TEHRAN - The Yemeni Armed Forces have issued a firm warning against any joint U.S.-Israeli aggression targeting Iran, vowing a forceful response that could extend to American assets in the Red Sea.
title: Yemeni Armed Forces warn of Red Sea retaliation if U.S. joins Israeli attack on Iran

description: TEHRAN- In recent weeks, the international community has witnessed an alarming escalation: Israel’s targeted assassinations of high-ranking Iranian commanders, academics, and civilians, followed by a public threat by the President of the United States to launch a military strike against Iran’s nuclear facilities.
title: Nuclear hypocrisy and the erosion of international law

description: TEHRAN – Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian, in a Saturday phone conversation with French President Emmanuel Macron, emphasized that the Islamic Republic will deliver a “more decisive and crushing response” if Israel continues its acts of aggression.
title: Iran’s response to continued aggression will be more crushing: Pezeshkian

description: TEHRAN – West Asia is witnessing a long-feared scenario unfold. For years, analysts, officials, and politicians warned Israel and the United States that any attack on Iran would unleash a devastating wave of retaliation from the Iranian Armed Forces and open the floodgates to a regional conflagration with international reverberations.
title: How many coffins will Trump send home for the sake of Israel?

description: TEHRAN – In the past two decades, Iran’s state TV has aired several series about the Zionist regime and its malicious and aggressive intensions toward Iran and other countries.
title: Atrocities of Zionist regime depicted in Iranian TV series

description: TEHRAN — As smoke still rises from the Israeli regime’s unprovoked aggression against Iran, European powers descended on Geneva Friday in a coordinated diplomatic push to extract from Tehran what their ally’s missiles failed to achieve.
title: Europe's coercive diplomacy seeks what Israel's war on Iran could not achieve

description: TEHRAN - Foreign ministers from member countries of the Organization of Islamic Cooperation (OIC) convened in Istanbul to address the recent escalation of Israeli military actions against Iran.
title: Iran calls for immediate action and diplomatic solutions against Israel at OIC meeting

description: TEHRAN-- Aggressive attack of the Zionist regime to Iran which has been supported by the US, several European countries and International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) can lead to criminal responsibility for those who have played a role, said Heybatollah Hazhandimanesh, a faculty member of Allameh Tabatabei University. Civilian hospitals were targeted by the evil regime, IRNA reported.
title: Aggressive attack of Zionist regime to hospitals is war crime

description: TEHRAN—A faculty member of Tehran University, Gholamreze Ghaffari, pointed to the extensive aggression of Zionist regime to Iranian civilians and said that attack to a country’s infrastructure is like attack to the whole society.
title: Attack to infrastructure is attack to whole society

description: TEHRAN—It is the ninth day of Israeli-imposed war against Iran. The ordinary lives have faced changes. These changes show the lively public culture of the society even in crisis time. It has led to returning to tradition of old days, mass living of families together and unannounced parties. Shelters which have embraced the tired and anxious souls.
title: Most different shelters in heart of war!

description: TEHRAN – President Masoud Pezeshkian delivered a message of resilience during a visit to the fire-gutted headquarters of Islamic Republic of Iran Broadcasting (IRIB) on Saturday, standing amid shattered glass and scorched debris to declare that "the voice of truth cannot be silenced."
title: Pezeshkian inspects bombed IRIB HQ after Israeli war crime

description: TEHRAN - As Israeli aggression against Iran escalates, the U.S. Department of the Treasury has announced a new round of sanctions targeting Iran’s defense sector, drawing sharp criticism from Tehran.
title: Washington imposes new sanctions  on Tehran after unprovoked Israeli strikes on Iran

description: TEHRAN - Helena Gholami, a karate practitioner from Lorestan Province, was killed in the recent Israeli attacks on Iran.
title: Iranian Karate athlete martyred in Israeli strikes

description: TEHRAN - In an Israeli regime airstrike on the Doukhouheh area of Andimeshk County on Friday, three members of a single family were martyred.
title: Three members of a family martyred in Israeli strike on Andimeshk, Khuzestan province

description: TEHRAN – Iranian boxer Rouhollah Salek from Alborz Province has been martyred following the recent deadly attacks launched by the Israeli regime on Iranian territory.
title: Iranian boxer Rouhollah Salek martyred in Israeli attack on Iran

description: TEHRAN - Iran's national volleyball team, known as "Team Melli,", are currently participating in the 2025 Volleyball Nations League (VNL). The team, under the guidance of coach Roberto Piazza, are focusing on improving their performance in Week 2.
title: Iran volleyball to build on their progress

description: TEHRAN – Iran lost to China 13-11 at the 2025 World Aquatics Men's U20 Water Polo Championships on Saturday.
title: Iran come 12th at 2025 World U20 Water Polo Championships

description: TEHRAN – The Indian Congress leader, Sonia Gandhi, has condemned Israel's June 13 military strike on Iranian territory as "illegal and a violation of sovereignty."
title: Strike on Iranian territory ‘illegal, violation of sovereignty’: Indian Congress leader

description: TEHRAN - A former Iranian nuclear negotiator has warned that continued Israeli military aggression and failed diplomacy from the United States may drive Iran closer to pursuing nuclear weapons as a means of deterrence.
title: Former Iranian nuclear negotiator warns Israeli aggression could push Iran toward developing nukes

description: TEHRAN –The deputy minister of information, communications, and technology (ICT), Ehsan Chitsaz, has said Israeli cyberattacks which target critical infrastructures in Iran aim to destabilize sovereign states.
title: Israeli cyberattacks aim to destabilize sovereign states: Iran tells SCO

description: TEHRAN – Former CIA and Pentagon chief Leon Panetta has warned that the United States will inevitably find itself entangled in a regional war in West Asia if President Donald Trump chooses to launch a military strike against Iran.
title: Attacking Iran will drag the U.S. into a regional war: Former CIA chief

description: TEHRAN- Iran’s minister of transport and urban development referred to the start of recording damage to buildings damaged in the war, and announced the government's maximum support for the reconstruction and renovation of residential houses.
title: Government gives maximum support to reconstructing residential houses damaged in war

description: TEHRAN –The United Nations Resident Coordinator (UNRC) in Iran, Stefan Priesner, and the British Red Cross chief executive officer, Béatrice Butsana-Sita, have voiced support and solidarity with the Iranian Red Crescent Society (IRCS), following Israeli airstrikes on the country.
title: UNRC, British Red Cross express solidarity with IRCS

description: TEHRAN- According to the latest reports and information received, all customs offices in the country are active and customs formalities are being carried out, Mehr news agency reported.
title: All customs department active in country

description: TEHRAN- A prominent yet little-known figure in Iran’s nuclear industry, Dr. Seyed Issar Tabatabaei Ghomsheh, and his wife, Mansoureh Haji Salem, were assassinated in their residence late last week.
title: Iranian nuclear scientist and his wife assassinated in Tehran

description: TEHRAN- Iran’s Ambassador and Permanent Representative to the United Nations has formally lodged a complaint with the UN Secretary-General and the President of the Security Council against Rafael Mariano Grossi, Director General of the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA), accusing him of undermining the Agency’s impartiality amid recent Israeli hostilities.
title: Iran files complaint against Grossi with UN Security Council

description: TEHRAN-  The deputy agriculture minister announced that the production of the country's basic products is being carried out without interruption based on previous plans, and added: "The necessary planning has been carried out to ensure the sustainability of the production of items needed by the people."
title: Production of essential products ongoing without interruption

description: TEHRAN- The trade balance of Aras Free Trade Zone, in Iran’s northwestern East-Azarbaijan province, was $32.7 million positive in the first two months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 21-May 21), the managing director of Aras Free Zone Organization announced, quoting the data released by Iran’s Free Zones High Council.
title: Trade balance in Aras FTZ hits $32.7m in 2 months

description: TEHRAN – UN experts, in a meeting in Geneva on Friday, unequivocally condemned recent Israeli military attacks against Iran, saying “the timing of the strikes — coinciding with ongoing diplomatic efforts in Muscat aimed at reviving the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action (JCPOA) — raises serious concerns about the deliberate undermining of peace initiatives.”
title: UN experts: Israeli attacks on Iran ‘deliberate undermining of peace initiatives’

description: TEHRAN- Germany exported non-oil products worth $308 million to Iran during the first two months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 21-May 21), the head of the Islamic Republic of Iran (IRICA) announced.
title: Germany exports non-oil products worth $308m to Iran in 2 months

description: BEIJING- The recent escalation of hostilities between Israel and Iran, culminating in intensified military exchanges, casts a chilling shadow across the Middle East and beyond.
title: China's vision for peace: De-escalating the Iran-Israel conflict

description: TEHRAN — Arab foreign ministers strongly condemned recent Israeli airstrikes on Iran, urging an immediate end to the military escalation and warning of dire consequences for regional stability if hostilities continue.
title: Arab foreign ministers condemn Israeli strikes on Iran, call for de-escalation, diplomatic solutions
Iran's 18th Retaliation Attack

description: BEIJING- As part of an international media delegation, I recently had the opportunity to visit Tianjin, China — the host city of this year’s Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO) summit.
title: Lenovo’s Tianjin revolution: Leading global charge in zero-carbon innovation, hybrid AI excellence

description: TEHRAN—Vice-President for Women and Family Affairs Zahra Behrouz-Azar in a letter to international communities condemned the Zionist regime’s frequent attacks to civilian centers particularly hospitals such as Hakim and Farabi hospitals, medical centers and houses and called it as a violation of human rights.
title: Vice-President: Frequent attacks to civilian centers clear example of war crimes

description: TEHRAN- The Arasbaran Cultural Center in Tehran, with the aim of familiarizing children and adolescents with the national heroes of Iran, is producing "Stories of Our Land Iran" in a visual format, narrating the epic tales of these champions, which will be published across various visual and social media platforms.
title: New animated series celebrates Iranian heroes for young audiences

description: TEHRAN- The English translation of the book " From the Riverside to the Ocean" written by Iranian writer Vahid Yaminpour has been published by Bab al-Ridha International Institute.
title: Translation of “From the Riverside to the Ocean” brings  Shia scholar's story  to global audience

description: TEHRAN- In a heartfelt gesture, members of the Iranian House of Cinema Board and a group of filmmakers visited the victims of the recent brutal attack by the Zionist regime in Tehran.
title: Iranian filmmakers show solidarity with victims of Zionist attack in Tehran

description: TEHRAN – A number of Iranian artists have responded to the hostile actions of Iran International, which is a Zionist-affiliated Persian-language satellite television channel, by posting a shared poster on their social media platforms, calling for a boycott of the network.
title: Iranian artists join campaign to boycott Zionist-affiliated Persian-language satellite TV channel

description: TEHRAN—Iran’s health and medical staff, who were successful in doing their duties during Sacred Defense era and pandemic time of coronavirus, currently fight against virus of Zion (the Zionist regime).
title: Medical staff stand against Zionism virus

description: TEHRAN—Vice-Admiral Ali Shamkhani sent a message to the Leader of the Islamic Revolution of Iran, Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei, and emphasized that the day of victory is near. Name of Iran will always shine, and the smile of martyrs reflects our tomorrow.
title: Shamkhani’s message to Leader: I am alive and ready for sacrifice

description: TEHRAN — Israeli media outlets reported late Friday that Iran launched approximately 10 ballistic missiles targeting the occupied Palestinian territories, with several reportedly striking areas in and around Tel Aviv.
title: Iran launches fresh missile salvo at occupied territories, explosions reported in Tel Aviv
